attributes.action: We want Daniel Hannan to be made leader of the Conservative Party!
attributes.background: As an MEP and very knowledgeable about the EU and a passionate believer that we should leave the EU, I am convinced that he is the best person to negotiate our withdrawal and that he will fight to get us the very best deal possible.

rejection.details: The leadership of the Conservative party is an internal matter to be decided by that party.
